name: taxi reservation
description: Assist user in booking a taxi based on departure, destination, and time constraints.

processes.name: Prompt for constraints
processes.description: Request user to provide initial constraints if not specified.
process: Reply: 'Please provide your departure, destination, and preferred leave or arrive time.'

processes.name: Prompt for departure and destination
processes.description: Request missing departure and destination if not provided.

processes.name: Prompt for time constraint
processes.description: Request leave or arrive time if neither is provided.

processes.name: Taxi reservation
processes.description: Book the taxi with provided constraints.
process: Use taxi booking system with exact input format: 'departure: [value], destination: [value], leave time: [value], arrive time: [value]'
